name: element-ui-x
description: 基于Vue 2 + Element UI的企业级AI聊天组件库

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/element-ui-x && npm install && cd ../../examples && npm install && cd ../docs && npm install
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run build:lib && npm run publish:lib
scripts.changelog:docs: npx conventional-changelog -p angular -i docs/src/changelog/README.md -s -r 0 && sed -i 's/## <small>\(.*\)<\/small>/## \1/g' docs/src/changelog/README.md
scripts.changelog:docs:en: npx conventional-changelog -p angular -i docs/src/en/changelog/README.md -s -r 0 && sed -i 's/## <small>\(.*\)<\/small>/## \1/g' docs/src/en/changelog/README.md
scripts.changelog:all: npm run changelog:docs && npm run changelog:docs:en
scripts.version: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json','utf8'));['./packages/element-ui-x/package.json','./examples/package.json','./docs/package.json'].forEach(p=>{const subPkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'));subPkg.version=pkg.version;fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(subPkg,null,2)+'\n');console.log('Updated '+p+' to version '+pkg.version);});" && git add .
scripts.postversion: npm run changelog:all && git add CHANGELOG.md docs/src/changelog/README.md docs/src/en/changelog/README.md && git commit --amend --no-edit
